XI.ii.3.E.6.b
.
Deaths on or After December 1, 1959, for PFOPs
For incompetent Veterans who die on or after December 1, 1959, the date of enactment of
PL 86-146
, all gratuitous benefits which were paid under laws administered by VA and which were deposited in a PFOP account before, on, or after December 1, 1959, in a PFOP account, are payable to the identical classes of dependents as provided in
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, 3.A.5
(except that children are entitled regardless of age or marital status) or as reimbursement.
